10-K-2024.calculation: (LongTermDebt - (CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue + RestrictedCashAndCashEquivalents) + OperatingLeaseLiability) / (NetIncomeLoss + InterestExpense + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit + DepreciationAndAmortization + OperatingLeaseCost)
10-K-2024.notes: Net Debt (Debt less Cash) plus COL over EBITDAR.
Total Debt plus COL divided by Total Capital (Debt plus COL plus Equity).
FCF calculated as Operating Cash Flow minus Capital Expenditures.

10-K-2024.calculation: ((LongTermDebt[year_1] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_1]) / (NetIncomeLoss[year_1] + InterestExpense[year_1] + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit[year_1] + DepreciationAndAmortization[year_1] + OperatingLeaseCost[year_1]) + (LongTermDebt[year_2] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_2]) / (NetIncomeLoss[year_2] + InterestExpense[year_2] + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit[year_2] + DepreciationAndAmortization[year_2] + OperatingLeaseCost[year_2]) + (LongTermDebt[year_3] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_3]) / (NetIncomeLoss[year_3] + InterestExpense[year_3] + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit[year_3] + DepreciationAndAmortization[year_3] + OperatingLeaseCost[year_3])) / 3
10-K-2024.notes: Three year average ratio, computed as mean of annual (TD+COL)/EBITDAR.

10-K-2024.calculation: ((LongTermDebt[year_1] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_1]) / (LongTermDebt[year_1] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_1] + StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest[year_1]) + (LongTermDebt[year_2] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_2]) / (LongTermDebt[year_2] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_2] + StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest[year_2]) + (LongTermDebt[year_3] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_3]) / (LongTermDebt[year_3] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_3] + StockholdersEquityIncludingPortionAttributableToNoncontrollingInterest[year_3])) / 3
10-K-2024.notes: Three year average of (TD+COL)/Total Capital.

10-K-2024.calculation: (((NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities[year_1] - PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets[year_1]) + OperatingLeaseCost[year_1]) / (LongTermDebt[year_1] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_1]) + ((NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities[year_2] - PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets[year_2]) + OperatingLeaseCost[year_2]) / (LongTermDebt[year_2] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_2]) + ((NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities[year_3] - PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets[year_3]) + OperatingLeaseCost[year_3]) / (LongTermDebt[year_3] + OperatingLeaseLiability[year_3])) / 3
10-K-2024.notes: Three year average of (FCF+Rents)/(TD+COL), where FCF is Operating CF minus CapEx.

10-Q-2025.notes: Total revenue recognized. Alias Revenue.
EBITDA reconstructed from components.
EBITDA divided by Revenue as percent.
EBITDAR assumed as EBITDA + Rent; Rent value should be externally provided if not found in input.
TotalDebt from LongTermDebt. COL from OperatingLeaseLiability. EBITDAR as EBITDA + Rent.
NetDebt is LongTermDebt minus cash. COL from OperatingLeaseLiability. EBITDAR as EBITDA + Rent.
TotalCap is TotalDebt + COL + Equity.
FCF is operating cash flow minus capex. Rent must be externally provided if missing.
Apply average over 3 periods externally. Structure follows the main formula.
Apply average over 3 periods externally. Structure mirrors formula for single period.
Apply average over 3 periods externally. FCF as op cash flow minus capex.

10-K-2024.notes: Total revenue is represented by 'Revenues' XBRL key.
EBITDA calculated by adding back interest (net, so must negate), income tax, depreciation, and amortization to net income.
Margin is EBITDA divided by Revenue; sum all keys for EBITDA.
EBITDAR: EBITDA plus rent expense. Divide by (Interest+Rent).

10-K-2024.calculation: (LongTermDebtNoncurrent + ShortTermBorrowings + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent) / (NetIncomeLoss + (-InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet) + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit + Depreciation + AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets + AccruedRentCurrent)
10-K-2024.notes: Total Debt is sum of long-term and short-term borrowings; COL is operating lease liabilities; EBITDAR uses EBITDA plus rent.

10-K-2024.calculation: (LongTermDebtNoncurrent + ShortTermBorrowings - CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent) / (NetIncomeLoss + (-InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet) + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit + Depreciation + AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets + AccruedRentCurrent)
10-K-2024.notes: Net Debt is Total Debt minus cash; add COL; denominator is EBITDAR.

10-K-2024.calculation: (LongTermDebtNoncurrent + ShortTermBorrowings + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent) / (LongTermDebtNoncurrent + ShortTermBorrowings + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent + StockholdersEquity)
10-K-2024.notes: Total Cap = Total Debt + COL + Stockholders' Equity.
FCF is Operating Cash Flow minus Capex; add rent; denominator is Total Debt plus COL.

10-K-2024.calculation: ((LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2023] + ShortTermBorrowings[2023] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2023] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2023]) / (NetIncomeLoss[2023] + (-InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet[2023]) + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit[2023] + Depreciation[2023] + AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets[2023] + AccruedRentCurrent[2023]) + (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2022] + ShortTermBorrowings[2022] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2022] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2022]) / (NetIncomeLoss[2022] + (-InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet[2022]) + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit[2022] + Depreciation[2022] + AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets[2022] + AccruedRentCurrent[2022]) + (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2021] + ShortTermBorrowings[2021] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2021] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2021]) / (NetIncomeLoss[2021] + (-InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet[2021]) + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit[2021] + Depreciation[2021] + AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets[2021] + AccruedRentCurrent[2021])) / 3
10-K-2024.notes: Average over three years; calculation applied per-year then averaged.

10-K-2024.calculation: ((LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2023] + ShortTermBorrowings[2023] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2023] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2023]) / (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2023] + ShortTermBorrowings[2023] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2023] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2023] + StockholdersEquity[2023]) + (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2022] + ShortTermBorrowings[2022] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2022] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2022]) / (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2022] + ShortTermBorrowings[2022] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2022] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2022] + StockholdersEquity[2022]) + (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2021] + ShortTermBorrowings[2021] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2021] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2021]) / (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2021] + ShortTermBorrowings[2021] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2021] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2021] + StockholdersEquity[2021])) / 3
10-K-2024.notes: Average ratio over three years.

10-K-2024.calculation: ((NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities[2023] - PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipment[2023] + AccruedRentCurrent[2023]) / (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2023] + ShortTermBorrowings[2023] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2023] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2023]) + (NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities[2022] - PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipment[2022] + AccruedRentCurrent[2022]) / (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2022] + ShortTermBorrowings[2022] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2022] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2022]) + (NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities[2021] - PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipment[2021] + AccruedRentCurrent[2021]) / (LongTermDebtNoncurrent[2021] + ShortTermBorrowings[2021] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent[2021] + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent[2021])) / 3
10-K-2024.notes: Three-year average ratio of FCF plus rents to total debt plus COL.

10-Q-2025.notes: Uses 'Revenues' as the sole revenue key from income statement.
No single EBITDA key; add Net Income, Interest, Taxes, Depreciation & Amortization from income statement.

10-Q-2025.calculation: (NetIncomeLoss + InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet + IncomeTaxExpenseBenefit + Depreciation + AmortizationOfIntangibleAssets + Rent) / (Interest + Rent)
10-Q-2025.notes: EBITDAR is EBITDA plus 'Rent'; 'Interest' is alias for InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet. 'Rent' maps to DirectOperatingCosts, assumed all operating rents.
TotalDebt = LongTermDebtNoncurrent + ShortTermBorrowings; COL = OperatingLeaseLiabilityCurrent + OperatingLeaseLiabilityNoncurrent; EBITDAR as above.
NetDebt = TotalDebt - CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue; rest as above.
TotalCap = StockholdersEquity + TotalDebt + COL. Use period-end values.
FCF = NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActivities - PaymentsToAcquirePropertyPlantAndEquipment; Rent = DirectOperatingCosts; TotalDebt & COL as above.
Averages the ratio over 3 years. TotalDebt, COL, EBITDAR constructed as prior items.
